etomica.parser

Class ParmedParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.parser.ParmedParser

  • public class ParmedParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that generates ParmedStructure objects by invoking the ParmEd library and serializing its Structure object using JSON.
    See Also:
    ParmedStructure

      Constructor and Description
      ParmedParser()

    • Method Detail

      • parseGromacs

        public static ParmedStructure parseGromacs(java.io.File topFile,
                                           java.io.File groFile)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Parses the given Gromacs .top and .gro files using the ParmEd python library.
        Parameters:
        topFile - File object containing the path to a Gromacs .top file
        groFile - File object containing the path to a Gromacs .gro file
        Returns:
        a ParmedStructure for extracting Etomica simulation components from the ParmEd Structure object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • parseGromacsResourceFiles

        public static ParmedStructure parseGromacsResourceFiles(java.lang.String topFileName,
                                                        java.lang.String groFileName)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Convenience method to parse gromacs files located in the etomica-core/src/main/resources directory.
        Parameters:
        topFileName - the plain name of the .top file, e.g. "test.top"
        groFileName - the plain name of the .gro file, e.g. "test.gro"
        Returns:
        a ParmedStructure containing the parsed data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the files do not exist.
